extendedIngredients.name: oil packed sun dried tomatoes
extendedIngredients.original: 1 cup diced oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, plus 1 tablespoon oil from jar
extendedIngredients.originalName: diced oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, plus 1 tablespoon oil from jar

extendedIngredients.name: skinless boneless chicken breast halves
extendedIngredients.original: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch pieces
extendedIngredients.originalName: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch pieces

title: 5 Ingredient Sauteed Chicken and Broccoli Rabe with Black Olives, Sundried Tomatoes and Feta
summary: 5 Ingredient Sauteed Chicken and Broccoli Rabe with Black Olives, Sundried Tomatoes and Feta might be a good recipe to expand your side dish recipe box. One serving contains 258 calories, 29g of protein, and 12g of fat. This recipe serves 4. For $2.64 per serving, this recipe covers 28% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 15 minutes. 49 people found this recipe to be tasty and satisfying. A mixture of oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, salt, water, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. It is brought to you by Foodnetwork. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and fodmap friendly diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 95%. This score is awesome. If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as 5 Ingredient Sauteed Chicken and Broccoli Rabe with Black Olives, Sundried Tomatoes and Feta, Best six ingredient dinners: Chicken with fetan and sundried tomatoes, and Sauteed Chicken with Tomatoes, Olives, and Feta.
instructions: Heat the oil from sun-dried tomatoes in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook 3 to 5 minutes, until golden brown on all sides. Add tomatoes, broccoli rabe, olives, and 1/4 cup water, season with salt and pepper, cover and cook 3 minutes, until broccoli rabe wilts and chicken is cooked through. Remove from heat, transfer to a serving plate and top with feta cheese. Usually served with capellini pasta or rice.

steps.step: Heat the oil from sun-dried tomatoes in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook 3 to 5 minutes, until golden brown on all sides.
Add tomatoes, broccoli rabe, olives, and 1/4 cup water, season with salt and pepper, cover and cook 3 minutes, until broccoli rabe wilts and chicken is cooked through.
Remove from heat, transfer to a serving plate and top with feta cheese. Usually served with capellini pasta or rice.
